Colleges page.description: A grid containing all the colleges of Cambridge and a mini version of their crests. Selecting a college will take the user to the Event page and display their crest in the menu bar.
children: Grid of buttons with college crest and college name

Event page.description: An example view of single event in the future, with a title, date and time, and location.

children.Menu bar: A vertical strip on the left side of the page with a single button to go back to the list of colleges.
children.Boat: A top down view of the boat with a member-role card next to each position, showing their name.
